website_summaries.verdict: A pure soy protein powder that keeps you feeling full and helps you build muscle without adding a bunch of sugar and fat to your diet.
pros: Pure protein powder with no additives
Container lasts for a long time
Almost tasteless, so it can be drunk plain or in a smoothie
cons: It doesn't mix as well as whey protein powders and it may have a gritty texture

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect serving size, but still satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I really like the natural nutty flavor of soy, so I enjoy the way this unflavored powder tastes (I should note that I divide the serving and mix it into smoothies and yogurt-based meals throughout the day). I think the difficulties folks are running into is due to the incorrect 1/3 cup serving size - when you go by weight (24 g), the actual serving size is about 3.5 level tbsp. I hope this information helps future buyers, although it would be nice if the product label could just be corrected too! All in all, I'm satisfied and will be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Health Nut Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I tried adding it to a protein shake with almond milk, frozen blueberries, and erithryol. It tasted really, really bad, the soy flavor is extremely strong. It blends well enough. Mixed into oatmeal with banana and plenty of almond butter it was OK. I mean, I guess that's just the natural disgusting flavor of soy...
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Taste is bad
customer_reviews.text: I brought to use in my recipes and it tastes so bad! Yikes
customer_reviews.author: Alex DeHart

customer_reviews.title: Cannot have any sugar or flavor artificial or get sick. This is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I like it because no flavor mix it with fruit and no fake ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Tobi

customer_reviews.title: Not good tas
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it tastes disgusting, and adds a weird flavor to what ever you put it in, I would definitely go with a flavored protein over this, but it does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love NOW Soy Protein products
customer_reviews.text: Love NOW Soy Protein products. I use this in a blender with apples or bananas to ensure a smooth creamy and delicious drink.
customer_reviews.author: Kilia

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product the soy and the whey isolate protein i change them up every now and again. Just the last order took a little to long to get here and i have Prime but still like the protein.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Unflavored - it's a plus for me!
customer_reviews.text: I like unflavored because I like to add it to my milk and chocolate mix. I get to make it taste the way I want to!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Jones

customer_reviews.title: works well for shakes
customer_reviews.text: This is a good low-glycemic protein powder. I mix it with fruit and unsweetened almond milk for a nice protein shake when I'm hungry and don't want to be too full.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Really like this Soy powder
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years. But I have switched from milk to juice and it makes it taste better to me. If I add fruit chunks it's just like the NAKED brand protein drink you buy in the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: A. W.

customer_reviews.title: Unflavored never means unflavored.
customer_reviews.text: I might try it later in smoothies or something, but for now, I don't really care for it. And I'm a huge Now Foods brand loyalist. It just doesn't dissolve well and tasted chalky.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: good price but unpleasant taste
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find an unflavored one that doesn't taste bad to replace Trader Joe's soy protein which has been discontinued, but this one is barely passable, hard to take without sweetener. Would be nice if were fortified too.
customer_reviews.author: anreoj

customer_reviews.title: Barely dissolves and overpowering taste
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this item isn't very water soluble, so it has a very grainy mouthfeel in my drinks, and has a surprisingly strong taste. I think I'll go back to whey if this product is anything to go by.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: edible
customer_reviews.text: The product does not mix well with juices, stays lumpy. Will finish it up but not order same brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really strong flavor that's hard to ignore. I might throw this out instead of finishing it.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Lila

customer_reviews.title: Rice protein
customer_reviews.text: I cannot have dairy products. This is a good rice protein product to add to my morning fruit shake.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bass

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and dissolves quickly in liquid or food.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping as usual, I guess it's doing what it's supposed to. Who knows for sure? Mixes well in my smoothies with a little bit of chalkiness.
customer_reviews.author: Deven Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: As a vegan and a cancer fighter, I watch my intake closely. This product keeps my protein count right where it belongs each and very blood test. I mix it with rolled oats and ground flax seed, topped with cinnamon for a very tasty combo.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Hiner Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong soy taste.
customer_reviews.text: Blech. Has a very strong taste that overpowers whatever you mix it into.
customer_reviews.author: E. McKechnie

customer_reviews.title: Chalky
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as tasty as whey, but then it's dairy free
customer_reviews.author: kagy

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: This one may be cheaper but make sure you are buying the correct size. This one is only 1.2 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It’s terrible
customer_reviews.text: This powder was awful, it didn’t mix well into hot or cold beverages, nor did it mix when I used my immersion blender. It actually hurt my throat while I was drinking it. It went to the trash two days after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: I like  the formula.
customer_reviews.text: This gives a good amount of protein, is tasteless alone but good in a flavored product. It mixes very well in a juice or gatorade type drink. It doesn't mix well in the milks, such as soy and almond milk. It doesn't have fiber, which I am so happy about! It seems once there is a trend every company jumps on the bandwagon. Thus they put extra fiber in almost everything, and this causes many to have digestive problems. I recommend, but hope the price for this and all else soon goes down.
customer_reviews.author: sonya w

product_meta.title: NOW Sports Nutrition, Soy Protein Isolate 20 G, 0 Carbs, Unflavored Powder, 1.2-Pound
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1NOW Sports Soy Protein Isolate is a good vegetable source of high quality complete protein that has an excellent amino acid profile. Soy products, including soy protein, have naturally occurring phytoestrogens and beneficial proteins such as genistein and daidzein. Make sure you’re getting the basic building blocks of good health with high quality NOW Sports Soy Protein Isolate.
feature_bullets: Same trusted quality with a brand new look! Packaging may vary

PURE, UNFLAVORED PROTEIN POWDER: NOW Sports Soy Protein Isolate is a good vegetable source of high-quality complete protein that has an excellent amino acid profile. 20 g of protein and 0 g carbs per serving! (Quality GMP Assured, Kosher, No Artificial Sweeteners, Non-GMO, Vegan/Vegetarian, Steroid Free)

The Informed-Sport seal is your assurance that each and every production run of these NOW Sports products has been tested for banned substances by LGC, a globally recognized assurance program for anti-doping in sports nutrition products. In addition to production run testing, Informed-Sport-certified products are also blind-sampled at the retail level up to four times annually, and testing results can be found at informed-sport.com.

GMP Quality Assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation).
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
